data.title: Village Green Apartments of Wayland — GLM Companies
data.text:
Village Green Apartment Homes of Wayland

532 N Forrest St. Wayland, MI 49348

Village Green Apartments of Wayland is a welcoming community nestled in the woods providing a country setting while still near the heart of Wayland. The spacious property features spacious 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom homes with clean finishes, abundant storage, heat included in rent, and in building laundry.

Home to around 4,000 people, the community exhibits a distinctive small-town vibe, particularly in the charming downtown district around the intersection of Main and Superior. Here you'll find local favorites for dining, everyday services, and convenience shopping. Wayland offers a great location with opportune access to the bustling city of Grand Rapids. While the leasing office is not on site, GLM Companies is eager to meet the inquiries and needs of all its current and future residents.

Call Today

(616) 840-5173

To Apply: Village Green Apartments, RentCafe
